channel.title: Full import list?

item.title: Full import list?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

You honestly don’t want a full list of imports

You only really use the imports for classes (or packages) that you use in your project. I personally prefer using explicit statements for each of the classes I use instead of importing an entire package (although it makes no difference whatsoever in regards to memory consumption), but its just preference. So if you’re using something like java.io.BufferedReader, import the individual class or the java.io package…if you’re using the java.util.Scanner, just import it like that or import the java.util package.

I hope that helps somewhat…you don’t need to use imports at all unless you’re using classes outside the java.lang package.

Read full topic
